your gauge **pattern notes** the mitts are knit flat from the bottom up first a cuff is worked in the main color then the main color and contrast color are alternated in a slip_stitch stripe pattern for the main portion of the mitt finally the upper cuff is worked in the main color when working the slip_stitch stripes in the hand section do not break yarn at the end of each stripe instead carry the yarn up the side of the work and twist the strands of yarn around one another taking care not to pull too tightly in this pattern work all slipped stitches purlwise with yarn held towards the
